composition: Olopatadine (HCl); NaCl, benzalkonium Cl; isotonic, buffered, sterile, clear, colourless-pale yellow soln
dosage: 1-2 drops into affected eye(s) twice daily for up to 14 wks. Soft contact lenses: remove before admin, may reinsert greater than or equal to 15 min after instillation

product.adverseReactions: Headache; asthenia; transient blurred vision; burning, stinging; cold syndrome; dry eye; foreign body sensation; hyperaemia; keratitis; lid oedema; nausea; pharyngitis; pruritus; rhinitis; sinusitis; dysgeusia; hypersensitivity; incr lacrimation; contact dermatitis (rare); others, see full PI
product.precautions: Not for inj, oral ingestion; soft contact lenses; pregnancy, lactation, children < 3 yrs
product.uses: Selective H<SUB>1</SUB>-antagonist. Treatment of seasonal allergic conjunctivitis signs, symptoms for up to 14 wks
